mapper.select: select max(purchase_num) from inbound where source_oder_code = #{sourceOderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select from inbound where source_oder_code = #{sourceOderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by purchase_num asc

select b.create_by_id as createById, b.create_by_name as createByName from inbound a left join purchase_order b on a.source_oder_code = b.purchase_order_code where a.inbound_oder_code = #{inboundOderCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:

#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
